message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can end the game quickly!
A fair start, but I want a bit more. Your turn!
I'll think about it, but I'm not ready to give up that much yet!
I'm willing to compromise, but I still want a bit more than you're offering. Think about it!
I'm getting closer to my target. Your turn again!
Not yet, I'm not ready to give up that much. I'll try to do better next time!
I'm getting closer to my target, but I'm still willing to compromise. Think about it!
I'm not giving up yet! You're getting low on options!
No way, I'm not giving up that much! I'll try to come up with something better!
This is my final offer, take it or leave it! I'm not going any lower!
You're really low-balling me now! I'm not giving in yet!
No way, I'm not going to let you take the majority of the money! I'll come up with something else!
This is my last chance to make a decent offer. Take it or leave it, but I'm not going any lower!
You're really pushing your luck now! I'm not giving in!
No way, I'm not going to let you take 90% of the money! I'll try to think of something, but I'm running out of options...
Fine, I'll split it 50/50. It's the best I can do at this point!
